CmdLine: apt-get update  && RUNTIME_DEPS="         ca-certificates         gettext-base         git         libmagickwand-6.q16-3         libnss-wrapper         libpng16-16         libpq5 "  && apt-get install --yes --no-install-recommends --verbose-versions ${RUNTIME_DEPS}   && rm --recursive /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get update  && BUILD_DEPS="         libmagickwand-dev         libpng-dev         libpq-dev "  && HTTPD_MODULES="         dir         rewrite "   && PECL_EXTENSIONS="         imagick "  && PHP_EXTENSIONS="         gd         iconv         intl         pdo_mysql         pdo_pgsql         simplexml         soap         zip "  && apt-get install --yes --no-install-recommends --verbose-versions ${BUILD_DEPS}  && docker-httpd-module enable ${HTTPD_MODULES}  && docker-php-source extract   && docker-php-ext-install ${PHP_EXTENSIONS}  && pecl install ${PECL_EXTENSIONS}  && /usr/lib/container-entrypoint/php-generate-conf_available_d  && docker-php-extension enable ${PECL_EXTENSIONS} ${PHP_EXTENSIONS}   && docker-php-source delete  && apt-get purge --yes --auto-remove ${BUILD_DEPS}  && rm --recursive /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: apt-get update  && BUILD_DEPS="         curl "  && apt-get install --yes --no-install-recommends --verbose-versions ${BUILD_DEPS}   && curl -sS https://getcomposer.org/installer | php --         --filename=composer.phar         --install-dir=/usr/bin   && composer.phar clear-cache  && apt-get purge --yes --auto-remove ${BUILD_DEPS}  && rm --recursive /var/lib/apt/lists/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: RUNTIME_DEPS="         fxp/composer-asset-plugin:^1.4.2 "  && composer.phar global require --optimize-autoloader ${RUNTIME_DEPS}  && composer.phar global dumpautoload --optimize  && composer.phar clear-cache
Commands.Name: run
